title: Luna Wedler
summary: Luna Wedler (born 26 October 1999) is a Swiss actress. She gained popularity by starring in the 2020 Netflix series Biohackers.Growing up in Zürich, she studied contemporary dance at the European Film Actor School. Wedler made her acting debut in 2015 with the film Amateur Teens and has since appeared in several films and TV series, including Blue My Mind and The Most Beautiful Girl in the World. In Biohackers, she plays the lead character seeking revenge for her twin brother's death. From May 2021 to spring 2022, she portrayed White Rose activist Sophie Scholl in an Instagram project.
